data.title: California State Parks Foundation
data.meta_description: A long list of backlog tasks. Opportunities for more custom reports and dashboards. Training that needs to happen.
data.text:
Dayspring’s Salesforce consulting team dove in and immediately worked on Salesforce admin punchlist items that had accumulated. Gradually, we moved to additionally suggest and implement Salesforce best practices; propose apps and tools that could serve well; train staff on Salesforce reporting; and build additional custom reports and dashboards.

As a part of the engagement, Dayspring also helped document existing functionality and processes around Salesforce, putting CalParks in a more resilient place organizationally and ensuring that its mission continues to be fulfilled—and that generations of Californians will continue to enjoy the state’s amazing network of parks.
